各位递归下载使用的什么方法?

VickScarlet /

      lifeRestart---やり直すんだ。そして、次はうまくやる。

GTAmodding /

      re3---GTA III, Vice City

TheAlgorithms /

      C-Plus-Plus---Collection of various algorithms in mathematics, machine learning, computer science and physics implemented in C++ for educational purposes.

microsoft /

      PowerToys---Windows system utilities to maximize productivity

bespoyasov /

      frontend-clean-architecture---React + TypeScript app built using clean architecture principles.

TheAlgorithms /

      Javascript---A repository for All algorithms implemented in Javascript (for educational purposes only)

donnemartin /

      system-design-primer---Learn how to design large-scale systems. Prep for the system design interview. Includes Anki flashcards.

khanhas /

      spicetify-cli---Commandline tool to customize Spotify client. Supports Windows, MacOS and Linux.

metaplex-foundation /

      metaplex---Protocol and application framework for decentralized NFT minting, storefronts, and sales.

TheAlgorithms /

      Python---All Algorithms implemented in Python

HashLips /

      generative-art-opensource---Create generative art by using the canvas api and node js, feel free to contribute to this repo with new ideas.

vxunderground /

      MalwareSourceCode---Collection of malware source code for a variety of platforms in an array of different programming languages.

AakashKumarNain /

      annotated_research_papers---This repo contains annotated research papers that I found really good and useful

mathaou /

      termdbms---A TUI for viewing and (eventually) editing database files. Only support for SQLite currently. MySQL support will be added soon.

DiegoVicen /

      som-tsp---Solving the Traveling Salesman Problem using Self-Organizing Maps

bpierre /

      loot-rarity---💠 Rarity levels for Loot.

solana-labs /

      dapp-scaffold---Scaffolding for a dapp built on Solana

Anish-Agnihotri /

      dhof-loot---Scripts to collect statistics about LOOT + derivative projects.

SeanDaBlack /

      AbBOT---

willmcgugan /

      textual---Textual is a TUI (Text User Interface) framework for Python inspired by modern web development.

HowProgrammingWorks /

      Index---Metarhia educational program index 📖

v2fly /

      v2ray-core---A platform for building proxies to bypass network restrictions.

dblalock /

      bolt---10x faster matrix and vector operations.

Vonng /

      ddia---《Designing Data-Intensive Application》DDIA中文翻译

LunarVim /

      LunarVim---An IDE layer for Neovim with sane defaults. Completely free and community driven.
